rules_text:
Artifacts you control are Food in addition to their other types and have “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”
Whenever you sacrifice a Food, you may pay 3 life. If you do, draw a card.
notes:
New card — Replaced Recipe for Disaster

Recipe for Disaster wants to be support for the UR archetype, but isn’t a U or R card.
